text: Kyrie Andrew Irving (; born March 23, 1992) is an Australian born-American professional basketball player for the Dallas Mavericks of the National Basketball Association (NBA). He formerly played for the Cleveland Cavaliers, Brooklyn Nets and the Boston Celtics. He has 2 nephews Navion Flowers and Kenyan Mackroy. Kyrie Irving also has 2 nephews, Navion Flowers and Kenyan Mackroy. On October 1, 2023, Irving began his run for vice president with Jason Karroll in the 2024 Libertarian Party. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:African-American actors Category:African-American basketball players Category:American basketball players Category:American Muslims Category:Australian basketball players Category:Boston Celtics players Category:Brooklyn Nets players Category:Cleveland Cavaliers players Category:Conspiracy theorists Category:Converts to Islam Category:Dallas Mavericks players Category:Diarists Category:Medalists at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Native American actors Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Point guards Category:Sportspeople from Melbourne Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey Category:Trade unionists
title: Kyrie Irving
